text: Pleasant Mills is an unincorporated community in St. Marys Township, Adams County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Pleasant Mills in 1850. Edward G. Coxen was named the Pleasant Mills Postmaster on January 16, 1850. It was named from its tranquil setting near a gristmill. ==Geography== Pleasant Mills is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adams County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Pleasant Mills, Indiana
